2.レース中に使うとくぎが 設定されていません。|本当に よろしいですか？|<yes: There's a spell set to use during the race...|Are you sure you want to do this?<yesno2><close>

10.スライムレースの 遊び方の説明です！|<br>|スライムレースでは レースが始ま:
This is an explanation of how to play Slime|Race! In a slime race, before the race|starts, you make a plan of where you're going|
|to use your special moves... The first slime|in the race will use one special move at a|time over a certain distance... The slime in|
|the back of the pack uses its spells at the|same time as the lead slime. Also, in a|training race, you can check your opponent's|
|strategy when you make a strategy, so make|good use of it. Give your slime good|instructions on where and which move to use|
|in order to win the race!
